content: this is a summary of a legal case in the alytaus district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property specifically a threeroom apartment the applicants claim has been granted in full and the court has ordered the dissolution of the marriage both parties will receive a 50 share of the apartment which is valued at eur 46300 and currently registered under the defendants name the case involves a couple seeking to dissolve their marriage and divide their joint property the court has followed the relevant articles of the civil code to determine the division of the property
